name: DoggoneDefense
description:
A collaboration between fellow IGM classmate Alex [alixp.itch.io] and myself!

WASD to move. vertical movement only possible on stairs!

LMB to bark, RMB to BARK.

A small game about a small dog with big heap of confidence! Help Dee-Oh-Gee keep her home safe from fierce and deadly intruders, one bark at a time! Defend the home from your foes (but don't be too noisy about it!). Hold off the enemy forces until time runs out, but if you make too much noise it's game over!

(Boss level is still WIP)
